remarks: Nonzero vector closure of map from vectors to functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 27-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmapnzcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapnzcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapnzcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapnzcl.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmapnzcl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapnzcl.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` C ) $.
hdmapnzcl.d $e |- D = ( Base ` C ) $.
hdmapnzcl.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapnzcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapnzcl.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hdmapnzcl $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` T ) e. ( D \ { Q } ) ) $.
